attributes.action: STOP punishing the folk that go out and earn a living each day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the workers are fed up with going out to work and getting slaughtered with no wages at the end of it, cant provide for our families, no wonder folk dont want to work, its to easy to live on hand outs.the disabled folk i can understand not easy, the god dam lazy, no excuse, its a bitter joke thousands of workers will moan about but never follow up.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
